Package menus

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlertMenu
    A simple class to simplify the process of displaying an alert menu when an error occurs.
    Display
    This class contains a lot of the rendering code and logic code for the Network View.
    ExpandableMenu
    A small class to create a simple, expandable menu for when large amounts of text need to be displayed at once
    ExportImageTool
    This class brings the user through a series of menus to configure a fractal for export as an image
    JobElement
    Represents a job in the NetowkrDisplay.
    NetworkCreationTool
    This tool, upon initialization, will bring the user through a series of menus helping them set up a Network for use.
    NetworkElement
    Represents an element of the network: in other words, represents computers that are connected to the network.
    NetworkView
    Displays all the NetworkElements and interfaces between the server and each element
    RegisterLayerTool
    This is a tool that takes the user through a series of menus to register a new layer type while the program is still running.
    RoundedButton
    Functions as a normal JButton but it overrides the rendering code to instead be a roudned rectangle, as opposed to a rectangle with hard corners
    XButton
    A simple JButton that displays an X for a texture instead of words.
